item.description:
"The Asgard was designed in Ireland, with local artists helping to put the finishing touches on a truly one-of-a-kind bar. Much of the decorative wood is over 150 years old. Two gigantic communal tables were designed by a local artist, and provide a lovely, unusual place to enjoy a pint. You'll also find drinks tables, pod tables, sofas and chairs." Check out the photo page to see the beautiful interior of the Asgard: http://www.classiciri...

The Asgard offers an eclectic menu with everything from traditional Irish pub fare to dishes from all over the world. Here is a link to their menu: http://www.classiciri...

After dinner we will be going over to the Boston Celtic Music Festival, but the Asgard will also have live music starting at 9:30 for anyone who doesn't want to go to the festival. (The music festival is set up as a separate event.)

The Asgard also provides $3.00 Validated Parking in University Park Garage. (Some restrictions apply.)
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the meetup sign on the table

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Irish Pub
